$eref.description: Models attribution to an individual or group for contribution towards some content item. In the Arc ecosystem, these are stored in the arc-author-service.
$eref.title: An author of a piece of content.

___type.description: Indicates that this is an author

___socialLinks.description: Deperecated. Included for backwards-compatibility. Content should be identical to social_links.

___org.description: Deprecated. In ANS 0.5.8 and prior versions, this field is populated with the 'location' field from Arc Author Service. New implementations should use the 'location' and 'affiliation' field. Content should be identical to 'location.'
___org.title: Org

___role.description: The organizational role or title of this author.
___role.title: Role

___awards.description: A list of awards the author has received.
___awards.title: Awards

___suffix.description: The real suffix of a human author.
___suffix.title: Suffix

___url.description: A link to an author's landing page on the website, or a personal website.

___expertise.description: A comma-delimited list of subjects the author in which the author has expertise.
___expertise.title: Expertise

___contributor.description: If true, this author is an external contributor to the publication.
___contributor.title: Contributor

___location.description: The city or locality that the author resides in or is primarily associated with.
___location.title: Location

___long_bio.description: The full biography of the author.
___long_bio.title: Long Biography

___email.description: The professional email address of this author.
___email.title: E-mail

___middle_name.description: The real middle name of a human author.
___middle_name.title: Middle Name

___first_name.description: The real first name of a human author.
___first_name.title: First Name

___bio.description: A one or two sentence description of the author.
___bio.title: Short Biography

___division.description: The desk or group that this author normally reports to. E.g., 'Politics' or 'Sports.'
___division.title: Division

___affiliation.description: The name of an organization the author is affiliated with. E.g., The Washington Post, or George Mason University.
___affiliation.title: Affiliation

___name.description: The full human name of contributor. See also byline, first_name, last_name, middle_name, suffix.
___name.title: Name

___byline.description: The public-facing name, or nom-de-plume, name of the author.
___byline.title: Byline

___languages.description: A description of list of languages that the author is somewhat fluent in, excluding the native language of the parent publication, and identified in the language of the parent publication. E.g., Russian, Japanese, Greek.
___languages.title: Languages

___last_name.description: The real last name of a human author.
___last_name.title: Last Name

___books.description: A list of books written by the author.
___books.title: Books

___book_url.description: A link to a page to purchase or learn more about the book.
___book_url.title: URL

___education.description: A list of schools that this author has graduated from.
___education.title: Education

$eref.description: This represents a reference to external content that should be denormalized
$eref.title: Representation of a normalized element

___referent_properties.description: An object for key-value pairs that should override the values of keys with the same name in the denormalized object

___type.description: The ANS type that the provider should return.

___provider.description: A URL that can resolve the id into an ANS element

___id.description: The id passed to the provider to retrieve an ANS document

___service.description: The type of interaction the provider expects. E.g., 'oembed'

description: A list of people and groups attributed to this content, keyed by type of contribution. In the Arc ecosystem, references in this list will be denormalized into author objects from the arc-author-service.
title: Credit trait

___by.description: The primary author(s) of this document. For a story, is is the writer or reporter. For an image, it is the photographer.
___by.title: By

$eref.description: This represents a reference to external content that should be denormalized
$eref.title: Representation of a normalized element

___referent_properties.description: An object for key-value pairs that should override the values of keys with the same name in the denormalized object

___type.description: The ANS type that the provider should return.

___provider.description: A URL that can resolve the id into an ANS element

___id.description: The id passed to the provider to retrieve an ANS document

___service.description: The type of interaction the provider expects. E.g., 'oembed'

___photos_by.description: The photographer(s) of supplementary images included in this document, if it is a story. Note that if this document is an image, the photographer(s) should appear in the 'by' slot.
___photos_by.title: Photos by
